manage all aspects of the skincare manufacturing process, including      formulation, compounding, filling, and packaging.Develop      and implement production plans to meet quality, quantity, and timeline      targets, ensuring efficient utilization of resources.Oversee      the day-to-day operations of the production floor, including scheduling,      workflow management, and equipment maintenance.Implement      best practices for process optimization, continuous improvement, and cost      reduction initiatives.Ensure      compliance with regulatory requirements, quality standards, and safety      protocols in all manufacturing operations.Conduct      regular inspections and audits to maintain high standards of product      quality, hygiene, and cleanliness in the manufacturing facility.Manage      and mentor manufacturing staff, providing training, guidance, and      performance feedback to foster a culture of excellence and teamwork.Collaborate      with cross-functional teams, including R&D, quality assurance, and      supply chain, to support product development initiatives and new product      launches.Monitor      production metrics and KPIs, analyze data trends, and identify      opportunities for operational improvements and efficiency gains.Drive      initiatives to enhance sustainability, waste reduction, and environmental      stewardship in the manufacturing process.Qualifications:Bachelor's      degree in chemical engineering, pharmaceutical sciences, or a related      field.Minimum      of 5 years of experience in a manufacturing leadership and managerial skills, with the ability to motivate and inspire      a diverse team.Excellent      problem-solving abilities and a proactive approach to resolving      operational column2: Job Summary:As a Senior Dispatch Executive in our Direct-to-Consumer (D2C) skincare company, you will be responsible for overseeing the efficient and accurate dispatch of skincare products to our customers. You will play a vital role in ensuring that our customers receive their orders promptly and in excellent condition, contributing to a positive brand experience and customer satisfaction.Key Responsibilities:Dispatch Operations Management:Supervise all aspects of dispatch operations, including order processing, picking, packing, and shipping of skincare products.Coordinate with the warehouse team to ensure adequate stock levels and efficient inventory management.Implement best practices to streamline dispatch processes and enhance operational efficiency.Team Management:Lead and motivate the dispatch team, providing guidance, training, and support as needed.Schedule shifts and allocate tasks to ensure optimal staffing levels and smooth workflow.Conduct regular performance evaluations and provide feedback to team members to foster continuous improvement.Quality Control and Assurance:Implement quality control measures to ensure accurate picking, packing, and labeling of skincare products.Conduct regular inspections to verify the condition and quality of outgoing shipments.Address any discrepancies or issues promptly to maintain high standards of product quality and customer satisfaction.Order Fulfillment and Shipping:Oversee the processing of customer orders, ensuring timely fulfillment and shipment.Coordinate with shipping carriers to arrange pickups and deliveries, optimizing shipping methods and costs.Monitor shipping timelines and track deliveries to ensure on-time arrivals and customer satisfaction.Customer Communication and Support:Collaborate with customer service teams to address customer inquiries, resolve delivery issues, and provide exceptional support.Communicate proactively with customers regarding order status, shipping updates, and Develop, plan and implement sourcing and purchasing strategies.Prepare cost estimates and manage budgets.Experience in developing new vendor networks and managing vendor contracts.Monitor the contract preparation and order placement in the right time according to the purchasing cycle.Oversee the end-to-end procurement process, including requisition review, purchase order generation, and order tracking.Synchronize and coordinate works & activities with all internals & external customers (inter department & vendors)Negotiate with suppliers to get the most appropriate prices & conditions. column2: Location: Bangalore, Chennai, Hyderabad, VijayawadaJob Description:As a Sales Officer/Business Development Executive for FMCG beauty care products, you will play a pivotal role in driving sales revenue, acquiring new clients, and nurturing existing relationships within your assigned territory. Your primary objective will be to achieve sales targets, identify opportunities for growth, and enhance brand visibility across various channels.Key Responsibilities:1. Sales Generation: Proactively identify and pursue sales opportunities to achieve revenue targets, leveraging a combination of prospecting, networking, and cold calling techniques.2. Client Acquisition: Identify and engage with potential clients, including retailers, distributors, salons, spas, and other relevant businesses, to expand the customer base and increase market penetration.3. Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong, long-lasting relationships with clients by understanding their needs, addressing inquiries, and providing timely support and assistance.4. Product Presentation: Conduct product presentations and demonstrations to showcase the features, benefits, and unique selling points of our beauty care products, effectively influencing purchasing decisions.5. Market Research: Stay abreast of market trends, competitor activities, and consumer preferences within the beauty care industry, providing valuable insights and feedback to inform product development and marketing strategies.6. Negotiation and Deal Closure: Negotiate terms and conditions of sales agreements, pricing structures, and promotional activities with clients to secure profitable deals and maximize revenue opportunities.7. Sales Reporting: Maintain accurate records of sales activities, including sales pipelines, client interactions, and order fulfillment, and generate regular reports to track performance metrics and monitor progress against targets.8. Collaboration: Coordinate closely with internal teams, including marketing, supply chain, and customer service, to ensure seamless execution of sales initiatives and deliver exceptional customer experiences.Qualifications:- Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field.- Proven experience in sales or business development roles, preferably within the FMCG or beauty care industry.- Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to build rapport and establish credibility with clients.- Excellent communication, presentation, and negotiation abilities.- Results-oriented mindset with a demonstrated track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets.- Self-motivated and proactive approach to work, with the ability to work independently and as part of a team.- Proficiency in MS Office applications and CRM software.Benefits:- Competitive salary package with performance-based incentives.- Opportunities for career advancement and professional development.- Comprehensive training and support to enhance sales skills and product knowledge.If you are a driven and ambitious individual with a passion for sales and a keen interest in the beauty care industry, we invite you to join our team and contribute to our continued success. Apply now and embark on a rewarding career journey with us!
